titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Save for Retirement Week 2009.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 8/3/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Supports the goals and ideals of National Save for Retirement Week 2009. Supports efforts to raise public awareness of: (1) the need to use efficiently substantial tax revenues that subsidize retirement savings; and (2) the importance of saving adequately for retirement and of the availability of tax-preferred employer-sponsored retirement savings plans.
